snippet: The Baptist State Convention is to be held at Elmira, on the 8th of October. The Eric Railroad and the People's Line of steamboats will transport Delegates both ways for one fare. Rev. R. M. S. Pease has resigned his pastoral charge of the Baptist...
lead_paragraph: The Baptist State Convention is to be held at Elmira, on the 8th of October. The Eric Railroad and the People's Line of steamboats will transport Delegates both ways for one fare. Rev. R. M. S. Pease has resigned his pastoral charge of the Baptist Church in Kingston, N.Y.
abstract: His explanation of the "damned hot" slander
